ing: 1 large apple, cored and sliced into 6 rings
des: "Quick, easy, and peanut-free! Serve this delicious SunButter Sunflower Butter snack to your kids after school, or make them for yourself!"
ins: Spread SunButter(R) on apple slice, sprinkle with granola and chocolate chips or raisins if desired. Top with another apple slice. Repeat using remaining apple slices.
